title: プリンセスサイレンススズカ
caption:
[中文]

特雷森學園的馬娘特別周帶著一顆興奮又緊張的心情，與害羞的小學妹小親王飛往美國曼哈頓去與她的知己重溫敘舊。
不但因為小親王優異的英文能力，也同時是為了讓本來只能透過通話交流的小親王第一次與這位無聲鈴鹿學姊面對面。

她們一起談笑、Spica隊各人的狀況、小親王第一次跑菊花賞、那很疼她的丸善斯基大學姐，還有她帶來的幾件漂亮的公主裝，由她設計並且請人訂製，勾起了無聲鈴鹿小時候就做的小公主夢

小親王成全了她，並且讓她穿了這件以美女與野獸的貝兒為主題的公主裝，而兩個小馬娘都沒想到鈴鹿穿起來是如此可愛，而很快的一場屬於三個小公主的睡衣趴成了她們最美好的回憶

花費好多功夫才完成這張圖，接下來還有特別周跟小親王的公主照，並且還會延續她們的故事內容，敬請期待

這張圖曾經，收到些不好的評論

但我想通了，這就是我的風格，沒有人能取代，AI也畫不出來的風格，我會留給願意欣賞的人，希望這個人是您

親王

-------------------------------

[English]

The little Umamusume(Horsegirl) SpecialWeek carring a heart with excitment and nervousness , flying to Manhattan to meet her old friend with her junior classmate Prince.
Not only for Prince's English capability ,also it's a chance to let those two who were used to meet only by phone can finally meet face to face in person.

They have a nice chat, talking about TeamSpica's members resently doing, Prince racing Kiku-Campaign for the first time, Maruzensuki senpai who always taking good care of her,and some beautiful princess dresses Prince had bring, it's designed by herself and created from commission order, and it ringed the little princess dream that SilenceSuzuka senpai had always dreamed when she was little.

Little Prince give her the dress to complete her dream, let her dress up the dress that based on the theme of Belle from "Beauty of the beast" , And SpecialWeek and Prince both didn't expected to see Suzuka with overwhelming lovelynesss when she wears it, and then, a Disney princess theme slumber party become their most beautiful memory .

Complete this artwork took me a whole lot of effort , but i still have the princess dress artwork of SpecialWeek and Prince come later, and the story will continue too, stay tune.

And this artwork used to.... recieved some bad comment

but I moved pass it. This is My style, no one can replace, not even AI. and i will leave it to someone who appreciate it. i hope that someone is you

Sean.M

user.name: 親王
user.comment:
就讀於日本川崎市洗足學園音樂大學數位作曲系，專業為作曲與畫圖，業餘小說創作與3D創作，也從事英文翻譯，中文筆名成高心，英文為Sean.M，養了一隻名叫馬卡龍的小胖貓(娘)

創作同人來源：《光之美少女》《彩虹小馬》與其他各式各樣

tags.name: ウマ娘プリティーダービー

comments.comment: 美しいですねスズカさん
